participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

socialdev_papq_01.Description: You have a friendly talk with your child. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_02.Description: You let your child know when he/she is doing a good job with something. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_03.Description: You threaten to punish your child and then do not actually punish him/her. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_04.Description: You volunteer to help with special activities that your child is involved in (such as sports  boy/girl scouts  church youth groups). | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_05.Description: You reward or give something extra to your child for obeying you or behaving well. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_06.Description: Your child fails to leave a note or to let you know where he/she is going. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_07.Description: You play games or do other fun things with your child. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_08.Description: Your child talks you out of being punished after he/she has done something wrong. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_09.Description: You ask your child about his/her day in school. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_10.Description: Your child stays out in the evening past the time he/she is supposed to be home. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_11.Description: You help your child with his/her homework. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_12.Description: You feel that getting your child to obey you is more trouble than it's worth. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_13.Description: You compliment your child when he/she does something well. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_14.Description: You ask your child what his/her plans are for the coming day. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_15.Description: You drive your child to a special activity. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_16.Description: You praise your child if he/she behaves well. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_17.Description: Your child is out with friends you don't know. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_18.Description: You hug or kiss your child when he/she does something well. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_19.Description: Your child goes out without a set time to be home. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_20.Description: You talk to your child about his/her friends. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_21.Description: Your child is out after dark without an adult with him/her. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_22.Description: You let your child out of a punishment early (like lift restrictions earlier than you originally said). | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_23.Description: Your child helps plan family activities. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_24.Description: You get so busy that you forgot where your child is and what he/she is doing. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_25.Description: Your child is not punished when he/she has done something wrong. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_26.Description: You attend PTA meetings  parent/teacher conferences  or other meetings at your child's school. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_27.Description: You tell your child that you like it when he/she helps out around the house. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_28.Description: You don't check that your child comes home at the time he/she was supposed to. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_29.Description: You don't tell your child where you are going. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_30.Description: Your child comes home from school more than an hour past the time you expect him/her. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_31.Description: The punishment you give your child depends on your mood. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_32.Description: Your child is at home without adult supervision. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_33.Description: You spank your child with your hand when he/she is misbehaving. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_34.Description: You ignore your child when he/she is misbehaving. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_35.Description: You slap your child when he/she has dome something wrong. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_36.Description: You take away privileges or money from your child as a punishment. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_37.Description: You send your child to his/her room as a punishment. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_38.Description: You hit your child with a belt  switch  or other object when he/she has done something wrong. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_39.Description: You yell or scream at your child when he/she has done something wrong. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_40.Description: You calmly explain to your child why his/her behavior was wrong when he/she misbehaves. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_41.Description: You use time out (make him/her sit or stand in a corner) as a punishment. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always

socialdev_papq_42.Description: You give your child extra chores as a punishment. | 0 = Never ; 1=  Almost never ; 2=  Sometimes ; 3=  Often ; 4 = Always
